about_p1: Welcome to the website of the Knitted Garment Craft of the Apergis family. Our company is located in Nea Ionia, Attica and is active in the production of high quality knitted garments. Our creations are mainly women's garments in various modern designs and colors.
about_p2: Our craft was founded in 1982 and to this day it is distinguished for the excellent stitching and quality of its garments. We have collaborated with the biggest Greek clothing companies such as BSB, Attrativo, Helmi and Sotris as well as with companies abroad. We offer wholesale and retail of our knitwear. In our company's premises there is also a show room for the demonstration of our garments.
services_p1: Our handicrafts offer a high quality knitted garment production service. Cutting & sewing of designs for unique creations. Our services - knitting, cutting, sewing, ironing, garment packaging and sample making - are provided with a focus on excellent service, detail and inspired style, always with care and love!
